lead_paragraph: Roland Alberg had a goal and an assist to help the Philadelphia Union beat nine-man Sporting Kansas City 2-0 on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Alberg's Goal and Assist Help Union Beat Sporting 2-0
headline.main: Alberg's Goal and Assist Help Union Beat Sporting 2-0
